id.description: Id used to query attribute buffers from nodes e.g. `layers/0/nodes/{resource_id}/attributes/{id}`

name.description: name of the field/attribute. Must be unique per the layer.

enum-description.fixed-point: **For integer format ONLY**. `scale` and `offset` will be applied: `X_float= (float)X_int * scale + offset`
enum-description.indexed-utf8-string: Attribute buffer will contains a binary header (little-endian) { `string_count`: UInt32, `sum_of_all_strings_size_in_bytes`:Uint32} follow by an array of UInt32 string sizes (in bytes). Each string data follows.

enum-description.per-face: _TBD, to be removed if not useful_

binding.description: Binding for attribute values. (`per-face` is valid if topology is `triangle` only)

offset.description: number of byte to skip from the beginning of the binary buffer (e.g. useful to describe 'legacy' buffer that have a header). Default=`0`
